library_catalog.title: MATE
library_catalog.description: To help stave off her enemies, Serena Paris, a Human-Were hybrid, forms a partnership with Koen Alexander. Read by Ellie Gossage and Teddy Hamilton. 14 hours, 30 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Ali Hazelwood

library_catalog.title: THE IMPOSSIBLE FORTUNE
library_catalog.description: The fifth book in the Thursday Murder Club series. The gang look into the disappearance of a guest Elizabeth met at a wedding. Read by Fiona Shaw. 10 hours, 29 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Richard Osman

library_catalog.title: REGRETTING YOU
library_catalog.description: A tragic accident further strains the relationship between a mother and her teenage daughter; the basis of the movie. Read by Tanya Eby and Lauren Ezzo. 11 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Colleen Hoover

library_catalog.title: QUICKSILVER
library_catalog.description: Saeris is transported to a dangerous land of ice and snow, where she must contend with a Fae warrior who has suspect agendas. Read by Stella Bloom and Anthony Palmini. 20 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Callie Hart

library_catalog.title: DUNGEON CRAWLER CARL
library_catalog.description: A Coast Guard vet named Carl and his ex-girlfriend’s cat, Princess Donut, are trapped in a fantasy dungeon. Read by Jeff Hays. 13 hours, 31 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Matt Dinniman

library_catalog.title: THE PROVING GROUND
library_catalog.description: The eighth book in the Lincoln Lawyer series. Mickey Haller enlists a journalist to help his lawsuit against an A.I. company. Read by Peter Giles. 10 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Michael Connelly

library_catalog.title: WE ARE ALL GUILTY HERE
library_catalog.description: Officer Emmy Clifton investigates the disappearance of two teenage girls from a small town called North Falls. Read by Kathleen Early. 16 hours, 33 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Karin Slaughter

library_catalog.title: MY FRIENDS
library_catalog.description: A young woman looks into the story behind a painting that was made 25 years ago and a small group of teens depicted in it; translated by Neil Smith. Read by Marin Ireland. 13 hours, 7 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Fredrik Backman

library_catalog.title: NOBODY'S GIRL
library_catalog.description: The late activist and advocate for sex-trafficking survivors describes her time with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. Read by Thérèse Plummer and Gabra Zackman. 13 hours, 40 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Virginia Roberts Giuffre

library_catalog.description: The New York Times journalist and CNBC host looks at the fight between Washington and Wall Street that fueled a historic crash of the stock market. Read by the author. 13 hours, 31 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Andrew Ross Sorkin

library_catalog.title: 107 DAYS
library_catalog.description: The former vice president recounts her abbreviated campaign to become president in 2024. Read by the author. 9 hours, 58 minutes unabridged.

library_catalog.title: HOW TO TEST NEGATIVE FOR STUPID
library_catalog.description: The Republican senator from Louisiana shares stories about politics in Washington, D.C., and in his home state. Read by the author. 8 hours, 13 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: John Kennedy

library_catalog.title: UNDER SIEGE
library_catalog.description: The executive vice president of the Trump Organization shares his belief that attacks on his family are attacks on America. Read by the author. 8 hours, 19 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Eric Trump

library_catalog.title: POEMS & PRAYERS
library_catalog.description: The actor and author of “Greenlights” explores elements of belief and reason that make up our lives. Read by the author. 2 hours, 12 minutes unabridged.
library_catalog.author: Matthew McConaughey

library_catalog.title: AWAKE
library_catalog.description: The host of the "For the Love" podcast describes major shifts in her life after her marriage of 26 years ended. Read by the author. 7 hours, 30 minutes unabridged.

library_catalog.title: THE ANXIOUS GENERATION

library_catalog.title: THE BOOK OF SHEEN
library_catalog.description: The actor, known for his roles in “Platoon” and “Two and a Half Men,” shares stories about his life in Hollywood. Read by the author. 8 hours, 58 minutes unabridged.
